scripts.build-desktop: cp ./index-desktop.html ./build/desktop/index.html && cp ./fleek.config-desktop.json ./build/desktop/fleek.config.json && cp ./icons.css ./build/desktop && cp ./pxtsim.js ./build/desktop && cp ./sim.js ./build/desktop && cp ./sim.css ./build/desktop
scripts.build-mobile: cp ./index-mobile.html ./build/mobile/index.html && cp ./fleek.config-mobile.json ./build/mobile/fleek.config.json && cp ./icons.css ./build/mobile && cp ./pxtsim.js ./build/mobile && cp ./sim.js ./build/mobile && cp ./sim.css ./build/mobile
